profile.name: Abu Ali Restaurant
profile.description: A premier destination for authentic Middle Eastern cuisine, blending traditional flavors with modern culinary techniques in a luxurious setting.

successStory.title: Revitalizing Tradition
successStory.challenge: Abu Ali Restaurant faced challenges in modernizing its operations while preserving its authentic identity. The goal was to elevate the dining experience and optimize kitchen workflows.
successStory.solution: TICMC implemented a comprehensive restructuring plan, including menu engineering, staff training, and a complete brand refresh. We introduced modern management systems and standardized recipes to ensure consistency.

items.name: Hummus Royal
items.description: Creamy chickpea puree topped with pine nuts, olive oil, and sumac.

items.name: Moutabal Smoked
items.description: Char-grilled eggplant blended with tahini and pomegranate seeds.

items.name: Lamb Mansaf
items.description: Traditional Jordanian dish with tender lamb, jameed yogurt sauce, and rice.

items.name: Mixed Grill Platter
items.description: Selection of shish tawook, lamb chops, and kofta served with garlic sauce.

items.name: Kunafa Nabulsi
items.description: Warm cheese pastry soaked in sweet syrup and topped with pistachios.

items.name: Umm Ali
items.description: Traditional Egyptian bread pudding with nuts, raisins, and cream.
